TEI.2.document_title: Samuel C. Hirams to Stephen F. Austin, 09-16-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: Samuel C. Hirams to Austin, September 16, 1826. Introducing F. W. Johnson
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1456

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Samuel C. Hirams to Austin, September 16, 1826. Introducing F. W. Johnson*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Harris Burgh*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="09-16-1826">Sept. 16th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Sir,*/p*
*p*This will make you acquainted with *person_mentioned*Mr. Francis W. Johnson*/person_mentioned* a gentleman of the first respectability who wishes to get into business. Your attention to him, will place your humble servt. under lasting obligations to you*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Saml. C. Hirams*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
